function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Scalability challenge due to the exponential increase in IoT devices in IoMT, leading to energy requirements and bandwidth issues.","Impact":"Ineffective containment of Covid-19 crisis, compromised data transmission, and increased energy consumption.","Mitigation":"Investment in scalable infrastructure, energy-efficient IoT devices, and optimization of data transmission protocols.","Technologies":"Scalable IoT platforms, energy-efficient sensors, and optimized communication protocols.","People":"IoT device manufacturers, public health authorities, and infrastructure developers.","Owner":"IoT device manufacturers, infrastructure developers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks due to constraints of IoT devices, such as low power and computational speed, and the need for energy-efficient security algorithms.","Impact":"Compromised data security and privacy, potential falsification or interception of sensitive health data.","Mitigation":"Development of lightweight security solutions, energy-efficient encryption algorithms, and stringent privacy protocols.","Technologies":"Lightweight encryption algorithms, secure data transmission protocols, and privacy-enhancing technologies.","People":"Researchers, IoT device manufacturers, and data security experts.","Owner":"Researchers, IoT device manufacturers, and data security experts."}]}
